cookie.description: JSON representation of a cookie to inject.

host.title: Host
host.description: Host to set cookie for. Defaults to .<domain> if unset.

path.title: Path
path.description: The path pertaining to the cookie.

expiryRelative.title: Relative Expiry Time
expiryRelative.description: Expiry time of the cookie in seconds relative to the injection time. Defaults to pref value for cookiebanners.cookieInjector.defaultExpiryRelative.

unsetValue.title: Unset Value
unsetValue.description: If an existing cookie of the same name sets this value it may be overwritten by this rule.

isSecure.title: Secure Cookie
isSecure.description: true if the cookie was transmitted over ssl, false otherwise.

isSession.title: Session Cookie
isSession.description: true if the cookie is a session cookie.

isHTTPOnly.title: HTTP-Only
isHTTPOnly.description: true if the cookie is an http only cookie.

title: Cookie Banner Rule

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier of the rule. This should match the domain field.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Domain of the site the rule describes.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Cookie banner related cookies to be injected when the side loads.

optIn.title: Opt-in cookies
optIn.description: Cookies to be set to signal opt-in state.

optOut.title: Opt-out cookies
optOut.description: Cookies to be set to signal opt-out state.

click.title: Click
click.description: Rules for detection of the cookie banner and simulated clicks.

presence.title: Presence Selector
presence.description: Query selector to detect cookie banner element.

hide.title: Hide Selector
hide.description: Query selector for element to hide while handling cookie banner. Defaults to 'presence' selector.

optOut.title: Opt-out Selector
optOut.description: Query selector for opt-out / reject all button

optIn.title: Opt-in Selector
optIn.description: Query selector for opt-in / accept all button

description: Rule containing instructions on how to handle a cookie banner on a specific site.
